overview: Amanda has been dreaming of having her own real-life book romance. When one day, she stumbles upon a penny, her wish starts to become reality as it leads her to Felicity. Brought together by one very lucky penny, their paths cross, and sparks fly between the two.

production_companies.name: UCLA School of Film and Television

tagline: Complete strangers are both looking for love, but the likelihood that they will meet is slim, especially when their fate is in the hands of a penny.
title: Lucky Penny
